title: Implement safe ID generation system
description: Create scripts/id-generator.py with timestamp-based ID generation (format: task-{parent_id}_{timestamp}_{counter}). Include ID reservation system to prevent collisions, atomic increment using file-based counter, and rollback capability if task creation fails.
completion_notes: Implemented ID generator with timestamp-based unique IDs, reservation system, atomic counter, rollback capability, and stale reservation cleanup
notes: Timestamp format: YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS-microseconds for guaranteed uniqueness
